transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (head in his hands) My... girlfriend and I... broke up last weekend.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Miss Nesbitt, my one true love... While I was saving civilization and talking to Gilligan, Miss Nesbitt was busy finding herself another super-hero!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Mmmm. Quite handsome. Not like you. He's a lawyer and a doctor, but he's sensitive. And a good kisser!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh! Space Ghost! I forgot to tell you something.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Miss Nesbitt called? When? Why didn't you get me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ah, my beautiful Miss Nesbitt called, for me. (smile sparkles)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, to say you're still broken up.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Like you guys are such prizes?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Well, I am fairly evil, but, uh, I've been happily married to my beautiful wife Linda, for over six years now.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: He was getting on my nerves.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: That was the first time you've blown him up.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I'm not doing the show tonight.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Nooooo! Carrot Top? I can't handle Carrot Top tonight!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in to set - sounding dejected) Greetings... I'm Space Ghost... On tonight's program... we have comedian Carrot Top... and comedian Carrot Top... Now, play me to the desk, Zorak, I guess. (Zorak plays him to the desk) Please welcome... Carrot Top.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Heyyyy! It's the Hair Bear Bunch! (sings ditty, playing with his hair) Hello!

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: (looks to both sides, starts humming "Jetsons" theme song) Here comes Ted Turner... Jane, his wife. (plays with his hair and growls) I'm having too much fun, Space Ghost!

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: (plays with his hair some more) Can you do that, Space Ghost? Come on, try it!

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Come on, you big super-powered man! (laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Okay, let's just get this over with.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: No one's watching, what time's this thing come on?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Does space have the same time zones...

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, okay, cool... I love your show, it was so funny!

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: I love this show! You are the king, you're the king of late night.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Ouch! Space Ghost, be nice to me.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Of course, of course, of course, of course.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, right on. It's good to be here.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Why do they call me Carrot Top?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: 'Cause all the good ones were taken.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: I wanted to be Hootie. Hootie! Say it, it's fun. Hootie!

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: I wish I was Hootie. Maybe I will be Hootie. Maybe I'll change my name to Hootie.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos back in) Where's Miss Nesbitt? Where's Miss Nesbitt?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Oh, I meant, there's Christy! Did I say "Miss Nesbitt"? (laughs) Sorry. There's Christy. (Christy plays the drums)

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: What am I workin' on these days?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, what are you working on these days?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Oh, a TV, a TV show, I have my own show.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: (pause) You ever take a whole big bottle of mouthwash and just guzzle it all the way down?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Miss Nesbitt does, before she kisses the new guy!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (motions as if he is going to zap Zorak with destructo ray, then stops)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (with despair) Just forget it! What's the use? (sobs)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) The toilet, as usual. (throws lever, screen shows "CHiPs" car crash scene) Sweet, beautiful CHiPs!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (stops sobbing) That's what I told her. I said, "Give me another chance. I can do it! I just need one more chance."

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Um... did we miss a question?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: What, have you been drinking, Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yes, Carrot, I have been drinking... I drink from the well of eternal sadness...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Eternal, bottomless pit of blackest despondency.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (sighs) Oh, Carrot, I don't know if I'll ever be able to 'move on.' It might take a week, it might take a year. It might take longer. She told me she needs space. I said, "That's me! I'm Space! Space Ghost!" It's very dark, and very cold. It's so very cold in space.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: They film "Star Trek" there. I used to live there.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: It's very dark, it's very cold...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's... very... dark... and... very... cold...

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: (gasps, with hands by his mouth) Okay, okay...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ohhh... Carrot, it's, it's time for you to go.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: That's what I'm gonna do, I'm gonna start wearing tights.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Picture me in tights. Just for a second.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay. Time to go. Uh, thank you for having me on?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: Hey, right on. Good to be here.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: (making power band gesture) How do you do that? (makes gesture again)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Try this. (makes gesture over and over rapidly with both hands)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hold on, wait a minute, wait, wait, hold on, hold on, hold on! Wait, wait, NO!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (in control room, watching "CHiPs" car crash scene) Yes! Yes! Cool! (Carrot Top appears on Moltar's monitor) Hey, what gives? I'm tryin' to watch "CHiPs"! Get out of here, you freak! (throws lever)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Anybody call for me during the break?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: (in control room) (laughs) "Mommy, there's some frightening man on TV!" There's one of these scenes where they cut to him, and he's going, (makes a face) they cut to me and I'm going, (makes a face) I cut to him and he's going, (makes a face), he cuts to me and I'm going...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Look, will you shut up? I was trying to watch "CHiPs"!

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: I love "CHiPs". My favorite episode of "CHiPs" is when they're chasin' down that freeway, and they have that big car pile-up, when that car went fwoosh!, off the side of that truck...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, I saw that one. I like the one where...

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: And they always had, like, had that episode where they had a fight with the captain...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: And when Leif Garrett was in the limo, sleeping, and then his car crashed, but he was okay, and then every, then everyone got free tickets to his concert.

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: ... someone said "Look out!", all the cars are flying all over like this, remember that?

transcript.speaker: Carrot Top
transcript.dialogue: The best episode was when they were on the island, and they almost got off but Gilligan messed the whole thing up. (pause) I look like Reba McEntire, I just realized. Maybe that's what I'll call my book, "Reba", that way we'll sell a lot of copies of it. I used to love Reba...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (in studio) So I said, "How much time do you want?" And she said, "Oh, so now you have time for me!"

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: So it's like, I mean, how am I supposed to answer a question like that? (scoots chair closer to monitor) Look, I mean, it is my fault, and it isn't! Y'know? Sure, I had my chance to say certain things, tell her how pretty her hair smelled, pinch her cheek, things like that. Take her to the mall... But you know, work and all.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: There's a lot of crime out there, and I'm just one guy. The mall will always be there! She knows that! Oh, well, what are ya gonna do?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Space Ghost! You're talking to a cow! She can't talk! Don't you know any...

transcript.speaker: Star Lady
transcript.dialogue: Hey, listen, buster! I've just about had all I can take of you!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stares in shock, his eyes bug out)

transcript.speaker: Star Lady
transcript.dialogue: I don't need this, I'm a cow! I got things to do! Hey, can't you hear me through that hood? I guess not, since there's no earholes! Who ever heard of a fifteen minute talk show anyway? Come on, man! You lost the teens, those were the whole appeal of the show! Jan and Jace, they were it! The monkey, he was it! You? Nothin'! You bring in this bug, and this beekeeper! A, a beekeeper! And those crappy guests! Come on! Get some real celebrities! Burt Reynolds! Other super-heroes have secret identities! Not you! We know your name's Tad, nobody knows what your face looks like! Batman? Bruce Wayne! Superman? Clark Kent! Aquaman? Well, who gives a crap, anyway? Really! And this set! The planet's turning, it ain't turning, And what's with the cape? I mean, it serves no purpose! What, are cape's gonna look good in space? The cape's gonna look... like crap in space! There, okay? I said it! What, do you need a cape to host a talk show? I mean, really! And the bug! I mean, what's with the vest? It's red, it's blue, it's orange! Who can tell? Who cares? Nobody cares! I mean, give us all a break! You think it's cool to have no pupils! Just so you can look like Batman or somethin'! No wonder Miss Nesbitt left you!
